Follow Me My Queen () is a 2015 Chinese romantic comedy film directed by Liu Xin. It was released on May 1, 2015, in China.
Cast
*Lin Yongjian
*Han Xue
*Song Yunhao
*Song Dandan
*Li Jingjing
Reception
By May 8, 2015, the film had grossed  at the Chinese box office.
